name: BCM Inks U.S.A. Conductive Black
description: BCM Inks U.S.A. Conductive Black is a unique water-based flexographic ink for corrugated printing applications. It is used in printing boxes for shipping electronic components because the conductive ink eliminates build-up of static electricity. This ink is used on a boxâ€™s exterior as well as interior to dissipate static electrical charges that may damage sensitive electronic equipment, parts and components.
